Mayor & City Council

City Councilmembers are elected at-large, which means the Councilmembers represent the entire city, not an electoral district. The Councilmembers are elected by all voters in the city, not a voter group defined by a geographical area.

Mayor Lindamood

Mayor Pro Tem Elder, Place 1

Deputy Mayor Pro Tem Richardson, Place 3

Councilmember Alphonso, Place 2

Councilmember Graves, Place 4

Councilmember Gunderson, Place 5

Councilmember Raine, Place 6
